summary: Senior Data Scientist with a passion for innovating and creating data-driven solutions. Skilled in transforming complex data into actionable insights and developing AI-powered models to solve real-world problems. Focused on leveraging data science to generate new ideas, optimize decision-making, and drive impactful change.

experiences.title: President, Computer Science & Engineering Club
bullets: Managed data records and optimized club activities.
Designed event plans and analyzed performance using Power BI dashboards.
Hosted the College Activities Awards Ceremony

experiences.title: IT Operations Technician
bullets: Automated Client Report Management: Designed and implemented an automated system for managing client reports, streamlining data handling and retrieval.
Data Visualization & Analysis: Developed interactive dashboards using Power BI to analyze and visualize client data, enabling data-driven decision-making.
System Optimization & Security: Ensured data integrity through backup and recovery solutions while enhancing system efficiency.

projects.title: Emergency Wait Time Optimizatio
bullets: Collected and analyzed emergency case data from open sources, covering records from 2019 to 2022.
Developed an AI-powered model using machine learning to predict emergency waiting times with improved accuracy.
Built an interactive platform with Python, Flask, and Gradient Boosting, providing real-time predictions based on day, month, and time period.
Received a recommendation for outstanding performance and innovative approach in implementing data-driven emergency predictions.

projects.title: Urban Aesthetic Improvement Project
bullets: Developed an automation system for managing wall and door files, enhancing campus aesthetics.
Implemented a modern and organized approach to document placement, improving visual appeal and accessibility.
Awarded locally within and beyond my university
Top academic project (2024) among Saudi student entries.

other_sections: Developed university projects, earning recommendations for innovation.
1st place winner in the Translation & Video Editing Hackathon
